RR_verdict: We think the Altra Escalante Racer is a top choice for zero-drop aficionados who favor old-school, non-plated racing flats. It boasts minimal cushioning and offers an incredibly flexible ride—all in a lightweight, spacious design. We found that its firm cushioning might not appeal to everyone, but for those opposed to bulky, maximalist shoes, it's an excellent pick.
